title: With the Grain
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Take-out, Canadian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Long-time established bakery and cafe. At breakfast there is tofu scramble (vegan ask to omit side of yogurt). At lunch there is hummus & veggie sandwich, kale salad, veg chili (ask to omit cheese), or possible create your own salad. Casual space with fee Wi-Fi.
